metadata.title: CVE-2022-48718 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm: mxsfb: Fix NULL pointer dereferencemxsfb should not ever dereference the NULL pointer whichdrm_atomic_get_new_bridge_state is allowed to return.Assume a fixed format instead.
